scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "npm run dev -w @mc-server-manager/backend" "npm run dev -w @mc-server-manager/frontend"
scripts.build: npm run build -w @mc-server-manager/shared && npm run build -w @mc-server-manager/backend && npm run build -w @mc-server-manager/frontend
scripts.dev:electron: concurrently -n backend,frontend,electron -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev -w @mc-server-manager/backend" "npm run dev -w @mc-server-manager/frontend" "sleep 3 && npm run dev -w @mc-server-manager/electron"
scripts.build:electron: npm run build && npm run build -w @mc-server-manager/electron
scripts.build:electron:win: npm run build:electron && npm run dist:win -w @mc-server-manager/electron
scripts.build:electron:mac: npm run build:electron && npm run dist -w @mc-server-manager/electron -- --mac
scripts.build:electron:linux: npm run build:electron && npm run dist -w @mc-server-manager/electron -- --linux
